author: cnbc.com
title: Netanium and Atlantic Data Security Merge to Become Prominent Cybersecurity Provider in the Northeast
text:
BOSTON, Netanium, Inc. and Atlantic Data Security, LLC , two leading Cybersecurity solutions providers, announced that they have entered into a merger agreement, which will result in one of the Northeast's leading Cybersecurity companies.
Netanium, based out of Lowell, MA with offices in both Buffalo, NY and Charlotte, NC, has a depth of experience deploying today's market leading Cybersecurity technologies, specializing in SIEM, firewall, and endpoint solutions.
Atlantic Data Security, based in East Hartford, CT delivers services throughout the Northeast, Mid Atlantic and Canada, with a similar security pedigree to Netanium. Atlantic also offers their Support Aware portfolio of services providing Support Overlay, Virtual Help Desk, Life Cycle Management, Policy Reviews, Security Assessments and on Demand Technical Services.
"Together, Netanium and Atlantic will improve its ability to deliver effective security solutions to its clients, have more combined resources to pull from, and further accelerate its growth," states Netanium CEO, Kevin Haley.
Pierre Letourneau, Principal at Atlantic Data Security remarks, "There are other companies that boast huge portfolios of products who can sell you almost anything, with little chance they can actually properly deploy and support the products they represent. Both Netanium and Atlantic share a common value in keeping portfolios focused and relevant while addressing the evolving changes of the security market. Everything we sell, we understand, which means customers hit the ground running with the solutions we offer."
The merged company will be headquartered in East Hartford, CT and will maintain its offices in Lowell, Buffalo and Charlotte and look to continue its geographic expansion.
ABOUT NETANIUM
Netanium is a trusted, Information Security consultant and solution provider, focused on helping organizations to overcome resource constraints & streamline their evolving security programs. Netanium works with organizations to streamline the technologies and processes that best fits its current infrastructure, resources, and security strategy. Netanium has 15 years of experience focused on data management and managing cybersecurity risk.
ABOUT ATLANTIC DATA SECURITY
Since 1993, Atlantic has been representing industry leading security products to help get customers to an acceptable level of IT security risk. Atlantic works extensively with both large enterprises and SMB markets, understanding their business goals before any solution is recommended. Atlantic's strict focus ensures that customers receive the highest level of both service and support.
